attributes.action: well thats a surprise that a british citizen can do this
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear prime minister or more specifacly wat do you do for the true great british  
citizens of this once formally great nation only a shallow shadow of its formal glory. british jobs for british people my arse wat a massive joke on us i dont think this pm nows of our great heritage or wat the great nation is capeable of all he is able to do is count his money that we gave him without question. he is truely a disgrace he needs and the lords of common a reality check because soon a civil war of old will arise once again with out pitty and it is coming very soon tension is building and the once former shadow will arise

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
